game.name: Delivery Dash: Battle Couriers
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 빠른 전개가 특징인 배달 액션 게임으로, 패키지를 배송하고 싱글 플레이 또는 로컬 분할 화면 경기에서 경쟁하며, 실력 기반 게임플레이와 성장 시스템을 통해 자신만의 배달 제국을 구축하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast-paced courier action game where you deliver packages, compete in single or local split-screen matches, and build your own delivery empire through skill-based gameplay and progression.
